channel.title: Change Tor Default Port
channel.description: hi, is it possible to change tor default port? i tried to change the default port by editing 50_user.conf file and after that when i tried to run apt-get dist-upgrade it get error "unable to connect 127.0.0.1:9050" please help

item.title: Change Tor Default Port
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Possible.

  • No Intentional User Freedom Restrictions
  • Undocumented

Read full topic

item.title: Change Tor Default Port
item.dc:creator: hitamjahat
item.description:
hi, is it possible to change tor default port?
i tried to change the default port by editing 50_user.conf file and after that when i tried to run apt-get dist-upgrade it get error “unable to connect 127.0.0.1:9050”
please help

Read full topic
